column5: I was watching the free preview of WFN (apparently free on Starchoice this month) and recognized the smiling face of Bly, and as I was saying "I know her" to my wife I had to add "And him" (Cliff) "Oh, and her" (Monique). There were other faces on but I hadn't realized it was OFC propaganda in time to watch them all.  So try WFN on yer decoder just in case you're getting a freeby too.  JF
I have not seen it yet I wonder if TJ know what time they come on
No.. i wish i knew.. I get the "run of network" ie im on when they have got room.. lol   (ie.. Im cheap)  but heres the whole commercial if you wanna see it...
thanks I watch the channel a lot and just never saw it....
ive only come across it once or twice.....was kinda suprised the first time i saw it
hahaha yea I just saw it the last couple of time I was watchin it. I wish my pic was on the commercial ! hahah
